The Lonely Silver Rain (1985) is the 21st and final novel in the Travis McGee 
series by John D. MacDonald. The work was published a year prior to the 
author's death, and was not intentionally the end of the series. It is also notable 
for the introduction of McGee's daughter Jean, who he unwittingly (but not 
unwillingly) sired with ... Genre, Mystery novel.
